title: active installations Vs total downloads
body:
It would be good to know not only the number of downloads but also how many are active still.
If you have seen the google store they show active installations more prominently than total download count - and that actually makes sense considering the amount of trash apps going around in all the phone o/s .

comments.body: Couple of themes in this thread - providing access to usage data and a set of attributes that can help identify user segments.
Cliff, could you please give us any update on the matter - whether you guys still reviewing whether it is worth doing at all or really thinking make it real in a, well, not so distant future?

Now WP is the real 3rd platform in the market. My business partners/product managers would like to know our REAL numbers.
Otherwise I have more idea:
- how many people removed the app after an update?
- uninstalls are more or less than 1 week ago?
- sex of users
- age of users
Very great idea! It makes a lot difference that we have either:
